meanings.definition: A company that grants a franchise
meanings.sent1: The franchisors provided the guidelines for running the business.
meanings.sent2: The franchisors signed a contract with the new franchisee.
meanings.sent3: The franchisors decided to have a pizza party to celebrate the successful opening of a new franchise.
meanings.sent4: The franchisors were like the architects, designing the structure of the franchise system.
meanings.sent5: The franchisors acted as the mentors, guiding the franchisees to success.

meanings.definition: The party that grants a franchise
meanings.sent1: We received approval from the franchisors to open a new location.
meanings.sent2: The franchisors were impressed with the business plan presented by the potential franchisee.
meanings.sent3: The franchisors threw a grand opening party for the new franchisee.
meanings.sent4: The franchisors were the gatekeepers, allowing access to the franchise opportunity.
meanings.sent5: The franchisors were like fairy godmothers, granting wishes of entrepreneurship.

meanings.definition: Those who own and operate a franchise
meanings.sent1: The franchisors worked hard to expand their franchise empire.
meanings.sent2: The franchisors were responsible for training new franchisees.
meanings.sent3: The franchisors organized a team-building retreat for all franchise owners.
meanings.sent4: The franchisors were the captains of their franchise ships, navigating through challenges.
meanings.sent5: The franchisors were the heart and soul of the franchise, driving its success.
